select sd.*,sdt.deptTypeName,bc.companyName,psd.deptName as parentDeptName, csd.deptId as c_deptId,csd_deptName as c_deptName,csd.parentId as c_parentId from sys_department sd ,sys_dept_type sdt ,biz_company bc ,sys_department psd,sys_department csd where sd.deptId=#{deptId} and sd.parentId=psd.deptId and sd.deptTypeId=sdt.deptTypeId and sd.parentId=psd.deptId and sd.deptId=csd.parentId
select * from sys_department where status=1 order by sortNumber
